Introduction

Seonghwa is a South Korean singer, rapper, dancer, songwriter, and actor under KQ Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group ATEEZ, in which he debuted on October 24, 2018 with the release of their first mini album "TREASURE EP.1: All to Zero".

In 2021, Seonghwa debuted as an actor through the KBS Drama 'Imitation', in which he played the supporting role of Seyoung, a member of the fictional boy group SPARKLING.

Fun facts

1
The song "THANK U" was also written by Hongjoong to express his gratitude towards fellow member Seonghwa.
…
2
Seonghwa's role models are EXO's Kai and SHINee's Taemin.
…
3
Seonghwa originally auditioned as a rapper but ended up debuting as a vocalist.
…
4
Seonghwa is often the one who cleans the dorms.
…
5
Seonghwa auditioned to join YG Entertainment's survival program "MIXNINE" but didn't pass.
…
6
Seonghwa's nicknames include 'Mars', 'Toothless', 'Angry Bird', and 'Hwaseong'.
…
7
His microphone’s color is silver because he thinks it's cool and wanted to have it since he was a trainee.
…
8
Seonghwa now shares a dorm with San and Mingi.
…
9
In their previous dorms, Seonghwa and Hongjoong were roommates.
…
10
Seonghwa's possible stage name was "Mars". Hongjoong was the one who thought of it because "Seonghwa" reversed is "Hwaseong", which means "Mars" in English.
…
